name: Scale Fishing
description:
Scale Fishing is a favorite activity for penguins living in the Antarctic. The goal is to catch small fish, use them as bait to catch even bigger fish, and reel those even bigger ones in for even more points! Try to get as many points as you can before the time limit! (Submission for SGDC Game Jam S)

Controls: Moving the mouse along the screen will cause the hook to follow along with it. Bringing the hook to the top of the screen reels in whatever fish is on your hook and awards you with points

Good Luck!

By: Konstantinos Mokos
